quantify_realignment¶

Quantify realignement of spectra with various measures

Module Contents¶

quantify_realignment.complete_sum(spectra)¶

Intensity sum across all spectra

Parameters:
spectra: np.ndarray

spectra
Returns:
float

intensity sum
quantify_realignment.full_ratio(reduced, full)¶

Measure of lost information between reduced spectra and full spectra

Parameters:

measure on reduced spectra

full: float

measure on full spectra
Returns:
float

ratio
quantify_realignment.estimate_noise_ratio(spectra)¶

Estimates the SNR in MALDI spectra

Parameters:
spectra: np.ndarray

spectra
Returns:
tuple

noise level, signal median
quantify_realignment.estimate_noise_proportion(y, median, sigma)¶

Proportion of points in a spectrum that are considered noise that is to say their intensity is lower than signal median + noise

Parameters:
y: list

intensities

median: float

signal median

sigma: float

noise level

list
